document_data.name: Witchweed
document_data.mainbody: '''''Witchweed''''' was an uncommon [[evocation]] spell of the [[southern magic]] tradition.{{Southernmagic}}
document_data.Effects: The spell created an anti-magic cloud of smoke with a radius of 40 feet (12 meters). Any wizard within the cloud was unable to cast spells. The cloud also inflicted damage. The cloud did not move; only a ''[[gust of wind]]'' spell was able to move the cloud.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required a [[material component]], [[tobacco]], which was burned during casting.
